name: silhouette pong.
description:
Control the paddle with your mouse.

Keep the ball from falling below the paddle.

Bouncing the ball off of the paddle will give you one point.

Breaking an obstacle will also give you one point.

Press P to toggle auto-play, you wont gain points with auto-play enabled.

Press R to restart the game, this will put you back in the main menu, your high score will be saved. This is meant for when the ball gets stuck.

Maybe post your high score in the comments.

Also let me know about any bugs you find.
